alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 23 at 1:47PM MST until November 24 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches, with locally higher amounts in the Logan area mountains. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Wasatch Mountains I-80 North. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are expected. Traction restrictions are possible. Blowing snow may reduce visibility to near 0 at times along Logan Summit.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.
